# Plugin Templates

We created many Grafana panels, data sources and application plugins to this moment. To make the creation process efficient, starting with a well-constructed template is always easier.

| Template                   | Description                                       |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| [Application](application) | Demonstrates how to create an Application plugin. |
| [Data Source](datasource)  | Demonstrates how to create a Data Source plugin.  |
| [Panel](panel)             | Demonstrates how to create a Panel plugin.        |
